title: "HS Risk Factors"
format: revealjs

## 18 Indicators Selected

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
-   15 indicators from ECI

    ::: {style="font-size:50%"}
    -   4 based on I2D2 Individual Birth Risks
    -   4 based on HHS Iowa Public Health Tracking Portal (3) and ECI Annual Report (1) data
    -   3 based on DPS UCR data
    -   2 based on Census ACS (1) and SAHIE (1) data
    -   1 based on IWD LAUS data
    -   1 based on ICA data
    :::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
-   2 indicators from MIECHV

    ::: {style="font-size:50%"}
    -   1 based on DPS UCR data
    -   1 based on Iowa DE data
    :::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
-   1 indicator from Iowa Data Center

    ::: {style="font-size:50%"}
    -   1 based on Iowa Data Center
    :::
:::

## List of HS Risk Indicators

::: columns
::: {.column width="40%" style="font-size:80%; padding-top:50px;"}
1.  Alcohol and Drug-Related Crime
2.  Child Abuse and Neglect
3.  Dental Services
4.  Domestic Violence
5.  Early Literacy Skills
6.  Foster Care
7.  Health Coverage
8.  High School Dropout
9.  Homelessness
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="font-size:80%; padding-top:50px;"}
10. Inadequate Prenatal Care
11. Infant and Child Death Rate
12. Juvenile Arrest
13. Low Birth Weight
14. Low Maternal Education
15. Poverty
16. Serious Crime
17. Teen Births
18. Unemployment
:::
:::

## Health Coverage

![](images/question.png){widh="40"}

The ECI indicator is available for 2 poverty levels: all and < 200% FPL. We used the former for HS.
